categories: Category:Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carriers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Stronghold was a Quasar Fire-class cruiser-carrier in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At some point, the cruiser-carrier sustained damage to its hull and lay in a debris field with two TIE/ln space superiority starfighters. The 340-meter-long ship was equipped with sublight engines and four hangar bays.
The Stronghold was first mentioned on a card of the same name in the Imperial Light Carrier Expansion Pack, a 2017 expansion for Fantasy Flight Games' miniatures game Star Wars: Armada.
